Articles.Content:
Hello all, I need help.

Since updating to windows 10, I cannot get OpenGl to work as well as it used to for me before, it doesn't give me AA, and i get horrible fps drops intermittently, it's really ruining the game for me.

I have tried everything, forcing AA through the Nvidia control panel, which gives me AA back but i still get nasty fps drops all over the place, especially when using real plume. I use -popupwindow, and i am even using -nolog, but these don't solve the problem.

Before, i used to use -popupwindow, press alt+enter to enter borderless window mode, and hey presto everything was perfect, no it's a nightmare. And i am now a sad, angry panda, or is that kerbal?

Anyway, if anyone has any other ways of getting opengl to behave properly for me, i'd be ever so grateful. I have spent the last 3 days messing with settings and commands trying to get something to work.

Edited August 14, 2015 by SmashBrown

phew, forgot to include the modlist, 'scuse my rudeness.
Mod list has changed slightly since OP, but no matter what i do, i am still getting terrible fps losses when running in opengl.
